website_summaries.verdict: This is one of the more affordable options in the color-changing smart bulb category, and it's good enough to deserve a look if you like the novelty of color-changing light. The competition probably offers more bang for your buck, though.
pros: Misfit Bolt is a classy-looking smart bulb with an easy-to-use app that looks even better
The colors it puts out are true, including a bright, vivid shade of green that Philips Hue just can't hit
cons: Bolt isn't as bright or feature-rich as competitors like Lifx, and it isn't omnidirectional either, which means it doesn't cast light evenly in all directions

customer_reviews.title: This had so much potential but I was disappointed in the options provided by the app
customer_reviews.text: This had so much potential but I was disappointed in the options provided by the app. The good: The colors are cool The simulated sunrise is nice, especially on dark winter mornings The bad: Bluetooth connectivity is terrible, the bulb disconnects from the app overnight when my phone is a foot away from it and doesn't move which causes the simulated sunrise to fail The options in app are limited, no turn on timer other than the simulated sunrise, no way to control anything other than the brightness level for the built in color changing programs, not much at all other than a colorful lightbulb
customer_reviews.author: Amara Nance

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good product worked well for Valentine's day
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product worked well for Valentine's day. Love the fact that it is Bluetooth only issue is it never stays connected long enough to take advantage of the sunrise setting. It always seems to disconnect when my phone is left alone so I have to keep reconnecting to change the colors again. I assumed it was because I had an older phone (nexus 4) but even with my nexus 5x is doing the same. If they can work this out this product can definitely get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Love this product after just receiving it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product after just receiving it! I look forward to lighting my house with this and feeling like Tony stark!
customer_reviews.author: Shuujuu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps trying to sell you more things
customer_reviews.text: You can’t use the product to it’s full extent without creating an account or connecting to facebook. Then they asked to connect my other Misfit devices. I chose the option of “don’t have one” so I was redirected to a page to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have the Misfit Shine and was curious about the Bolt. I'm glad I bought it. It's really beautiful and it can create any atmosphere in your room. I will be adding more..
customer_reviews.author: Idol Image

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Still enjoying for my spiritual meditation almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sandquist

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Light!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great. My daughter loves using it and likes the remote control and color changing modes of it. Its bright enough to supplement any room.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mech

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Would've given a five stars if the app was a little better. Works great for when I'm at home and trying to turn on my lights from bed, but the app sometimes sends me spammy messages, as well as sometimes has connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome. Compared to the others in the area.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Zgonc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product. My son loves it. Easy to use app.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and light!
customer_reviews.text: Best light bulbs ever! One the exspencive side but you don't have to change it for like 20 years so makes sense!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Neese

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Works with my phone or misfit link devices.
customer_reviews.author: MrT2.0

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great item!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking at this product for a while - great deal and great item!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Love the fact that it has preset ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Love the fact that it has preset ambiences that I can choose from rather than just picking a color (I know it's in my head but it does add to the experience!), plus I like being able to upload a pic of my own to set a new color. Waking to the sunrise is a great feature! Downside is I do have to reset the Bluetooth connection from time to time but I still like this better than the Flux. Also wish it had a timer so it could be set to turn off at a certain time.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K

customer_reviews.title: 110 volts Restriction?
customer_reviews.text: My wife was so happy with it. It is really a brilliant bulb. The only problem was that it only accepts 120 volts and I am really worried to use it on 220 volts.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I wish these worked with Amazon Echo devices. Also, I wish they worked with a device connected to the same WiFi, rather than only with devices that are in close proximity via Bluetooth. Our daughters do love the different colors though, and the scenes (especially the one that flashes with the music) are really fun. Pretty good price point as well.
customer_reviews.author: JOBear05

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth instead of WiFi?
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the Misfit Bolt because I didn't want to invest in a Hub-centric wifi bulb solution. At the time of purchase, around holidays, I got this bulb for $30 which I thought was the perfect price post. This was my introduction to color changing LED bulbs and I'm happy with it. The iOS app and bulb work seamlessly but latest App update introduced some small issues like lag when switching color themes. I'll buy again which price goes back down
customer_reviews.author: Vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: Sunrise setting is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love the wake up to a sunrise setting! Wish I could permanently program a sunset followed by a sunrise in the morning rather than either or.
customer_reviews.author: EgyptianGouda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t even connect to the app
customer_reviews.text: Glad I spend $20 on just a regular lightbulb. The bulb will not connect to the app even when I’m standing directly under it with my phone to the bulb. It worked the first day I got it and then it hasn’t since.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Still having a hard time with The app for two ...
customer_reviews.text: Still having a hard time with The app for two days, currently waiting to hear from misfit with a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Regretting
customer_reviews.text: So much potential but falls short of expectations. Sunrise doesn't sunrise and the I thought it would work better. Works fine with on demand scene selection which is why I have it two stars. Wish I would have went with a Wi-Fi linked smart bulb.
customer_reviews.author: R_i_c_k

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not deep or saturated.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 7 , one doesn't work after update (yes you update the bulbs ) Have not received response from misfit. Also the colors are no vibrant. Seem washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Q

customer_reviews.title: Just recommended it to my grandmother in law she will love ...
customer_reviews.text: Just recommended it to my grandmother in law she will love it like I do. It makes people lazy but oh well.. Now nobody's grandma or grandfather will need life alert... Unless they need to go to the bathroom.. Your Welcome..
customer_reviews.author: christopher williams

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. No clue how ad showed all the colors and nothing worked from my iPhone

customer_reviews.title: I love the Bolt
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bolt. My wife on the other hand hates it and I havent been able to use it much
customer_reviews.author: Andres S.

customer_reviews.title: Best of them ALL!
customer_reviews.text: Great BUT.. Needs different selectable amounts of time (5 min, 10 min, 15 min) for the sunrise simulation rather than just the built-in 30 min one. and If they could add strobe setting, I'd be ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: the app is horrible.. cant shut it off from app
customer_reviews.text: the app is horrible..cant shut it off from app. There are no You tube visoes explaing the details....clearly a company of elegant techies who cant explain their products use clearly..Never again.
customer_reviews.author: james goldman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work just as good as my Hue bulbs. They do have a better looking green.

customer_reviews.title: App that connects to the bulb doesn't work well enough ...
customer_reviews.text: App that connects to the bulb doesn't work well enough. No way to schedule late bulb and also requires bluetooth to turn on which can take some time to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Ross S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much I use it all time I love controlling it from my phone a little pricy but high quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Ezra Dulaney

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Misfit released an update for Android at the end of August 2015, which fixed all the problems I had with slow bluetooth sync with my Samsung phone. I use it mainly to set mood and as an alarm, both work flawlessly. You phone does have to stay on with bluetooth on when using the wake up feature. Hopefully Misfit will add more features to the Bolt so that it could interact with Misfit Shine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Repnoy

customer_reviews.title: Hub Free Multi-colored Smart Bulb!
customer_reviews.text: The Misfit Bolt is a huge improvement over the incredibly expensive Philips Hue. There is NO HUB required! Just plug the bulb in and control it from the free app on your smartphone or tablet. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Byrdman

customer_reviews.title: sometimes bluetooth loses connection and when its connected it suddenly ...
customer_reviews.text: sometimes bluetooth loses connection and when its connected it suddenly turns off or goes dim w/o me doing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Pow

product_meta.title: Misfit Wearables B00YZ Bolt Wireless Bluetooth LED Smart Light Bulb
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingBolt is a wirelessly-connected light bulb that lets you personalize your home lighting to create beautiful lights capes. With a stunning sunrise simulation, Bolt also makes getting out of bed a brighter experience. Transform your environment with millions of colors and combinations available through the Misfit Home mobile app. Bolt works directly with your phone, no complicated hubs or setup needed.
feature_bullets: Create beautiful lights capes with over a million colors. With Bolt's efficient LED technology, you'll save electricity and have a longer lasting bulb.
Bolt's glass dome enables a 260-degree light dispersion with zero hotspots and has a sleek aluminum body that makes a bold statement in any room.
Get up-and-running in under a minute; Misfit Bolt works directly with your mobile device. No hubs required.
No Phone? No problem! Use Misfit Flash to control brightness and turn your bulbs on and off.
Set an alarm and wake up gently with a beautiful warm sunrise simulation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
